title: Bloodwych
content:
Having fun while indoor coding

Found a Javascript port of an old game i love.
and decide to spend some time into it.
Bloodwych

title: Goniometer
content:
Thanks to Youssef my focus seamless changed to my old jsGoniometer project.

WebAudio is quite tricky if you want exact values. It's always resampled to destination audio device sample rate.
To make it worse we even don't know the original used sample rate.
Until today...Audio Analyser

title: JSVecX with ZIP support
content:
Finally i tought jsVecX how to care with URLs and ZIPs.

I'm proud say that the emu is used for advertising an upcoming Vectrex game.

title: JSVecX Patches by Malban
content:
Malban also did some "small" changes to JSVecX which of course i merged.
He called them small but it's not only emulation improvement it's also enhancement like allow larger cartridges.
Right now the only cartridge which makes use of is "Vectorblade".
If you liked "Warblade" or "Deluxe Galaga" you should have a look what Vectrex hardware can do.
Play Vectorblade by Malban

title: News from the Vectrex front
content:
I like the Tiny8Emulators feature to show the chips doing their hard work.
I thought Vectrex needs that too.
Also added a lot of Roms from the Vectrex Academy.
Thanks to all the students and the prof for all the new software for our Vectrex' or emulators.
Vectrex Emulator using the chips

title: Hello World
content:
After all these years i decided to make one of this pages
Mainly to host all that stuff but also to make it easier to access for others

title: Vectrex emulator in vanilla js
content:
Forked from raz0red's port of VecX i did my own approach on this emulator.
I added resize and support for two gamepads
RMB for menu
Vectrex Emulator
